name: Ensure governance framework setting and maintenance
name_en: Ensured Governance Framework Setting and Maintenance
purpose: Analyze and articulate enterprise governance requirements and establish effective structures, principles, processes and practices.

management_practices.name: Evaluate the governance system
management_practices.description: Continuously evaluate the current and future governance system, including stakeholder needs.

management_practices.name: Direct the governance system
management_practices.description: Guide the definition of governance principles, structures and practices, and arbitrate key decisions.

management_practices.name: Monitor the governance system
management_practices.description: Monitor the implementation, effectiveness and compliance of the governance system.

name: Ensure benefits delivery
purpose: Optimize the contribution to enterprise objectives from investments in business processes, I&T services and I&T assets.

management_practices.name: Evaluate value optimization
management_practices.description: Continuously review the portfolio of I&T investments and services to assess their value contribution.

management_practices.name: Direct value optimization
management_practices.description: Guide decisions on investment, prioritization and divestment to maximize created value.

management_practices.name: Monitor value optimization
management_practices.description: Monitor the realization of benefits, costs, risks and performance associated with I&T investments.

name: Ensure risk optimization
purpose: Ensure that the enterprise risk appetite and tolerance are understood, articulated and communicated, and that I&T-related risks are identified and managed.

management_practices.name: Evaluate risk management
management_practices.description: Continuously assess and judge the impact of risks related to the current and future use of I&T.

management_practices.name: Direct risk management
management_practices.description: Define and direct risk management practices, including risk appetite and tolerance.

management_practices.name: Monitor risk management
management_practices.description: Monitor the effectiveness of risk management measures and treatment plans.

name: Ensure resource optimization
purpose: Ensure that adequate and sufficient I&T capabilities and resources are available to support enterprise objectives efficiently and cost-effectively.

management_practices.name: Evaluate resource management
management_practices.description: Review the current and future use of I&T resources (people, applications, infrastructure, data).

management_practices.name: Direct resource management
management_practices.description: Guide decisions on allocation, prioritization and sourcing of I&T resources.

management_practices.name: Monitor resource management
management_practices.description: Monitor objectives, capacity and performance of critical I&T resources.

name: Ensure stakeholder engagement
purpose: Ensure effective stakeholder engagement and appropriate reporting on I&T performance, risks and costs.

management_practices.name: Evaluate stakeholder engagement
management_practices.description: Continuously assess the effectiveness of communications, reporting and interactions with stakeholders.

management_practices.name: Direct engagement and communication
management_practices.description: Define and direct approaches for stakeholder communication, consultation and reporting.

management_practices.name: Monitor stakeholder engagement
management_practices.description: Monitor stakeholder satisfaction, needs and feedback and adjust engagement mechanisms accordingly.

name: Manage the I&T management framework
purpose: Provide an integrated and consistent I&T management framework aligned with enterprise objectives.

management_practices.name: Establish the I&T management framework
management_practices.description: Define I&T management principles, policies, processes and structures aligned with enterprise governance.

management_practices.name: Implement and communicate the framework
management_practices.description: Deploy the I&T management framework, communicate it to stakeholders and support its adoption.

management_practices.name: Monitor and improve the framework
management_practices.description: Periodically review framework effectiveness and incorporate lessons learned and environmental changes.

name: Manage strategy
purpose: Define, maintain and communicate an I&T strategy aligned with business strategy and priorities.

management_practices.name: Analyze the environment and needs
management_practices.description: Analyze business strategy and the internal and external environment to identify key I&T drivers.

management_practices.name: Define the I&T strategy
management_practices.description: Formulate the I&T strategy, target trajectory and major medium- and long-term directions.

management_practices.name: Communicate and track the strategy
management_practices.description: Communicate the I&T strategy, monitor its execution and adjust based on feedback and changes.

name: Manage enterprise architecture
purpose: Provide and maintain an integrated enterprise architecture covering processes, data, applications and technologies.

management_practices.name: Define the target architecture
management_practices.description: Define the target architecture vision covering business processes, information, applications and technologies.

management_practices.name: Manage architecture principles and standards
management_practices.description: Develop and maintain architecture principles, norms and standards and control their application.

management_practices.name: Govern architecture decisions
management_practices.description: Establish committees and mechanisms to validate architecture decisions in projects and investments.

name: Manage innovation
purpose: Identify, evaluate and integrate new value-creating I&T ideas and technologies.

management_practices.name: Identify innovation opportunities
management_practices.description: Scan the internal and external environment to identify relevant innovative ideas and technologies.

management_practices.name: Assess and experiment
management_practices.description: Analyze the feasibility, risks and benefits of innovations and carry out pilots or proofs of concept.

management_practices.name: Industrialize and capitalize
management_practices.description: Integrate adopted innovations into the portfolio and operations and capture lessons learned.

name: Manage the I&T portfolio
purpose: Optimize the portfolio of I&T programs, projects, services and assets to maximize value.

management_practices.name: Build and maintain the portfolio
management_practices.description: Identify and structure all I&T projects, programs and services within a single portfolio.

management_practices.name: Prioritize and arbitrate
management_practices.description: Define prioritization criteria and arbitrate investments, divestments and postponements.

management_practices.name: Monitor portfolio performance
management_practices.description: Monitor progress, risks, costs and benefits at the overall portfolio level.

name: Manage budget and costs
purpose: Plan, allocate and control I&T budgets and costs in line with business priorities.

management_practices.name: Plan I&T budgets
management_practices.description: Establish multi-year and annual I&T budgets aligned with strategy and business demand.

management_practices.name: Track costs and variances
management_practices.description: Measure expenditures by service, project and unit, analyze budget versus actual variances and trigger actions.

management_practices.name: Optimize costs
management_practices.description: Identify I&T cost optimization opportunities and manage cost-reduction or rationalization plans.

name: Manage I&T human resources
purpose: Ensure the availability of suitable, motivated and well-organized I&T skills to deliver value.

management_practices.name: Plan capabilities
management_practices.description: Identify required I&T skills and develop training and recruitment plans.

management_practices.name: Organize roles and responsibilities
management_practices.description: Define job descriptions, responsibilities and organizational models for I&T teams.

management_practices.name: Develop and retain talent
management_practices.description: Implement training, certification, career management and motivation initiatives.

name: Manage relationships with business
purpose: Ensure effective and continuous collaboration between I&T and the business.

management_practices.name: Organize the I&Tâ€“business interface
management_practices.description: Establish liaison roles (BRM, business representatives) and regular forums for dialogue.

management_practices.name: Manage demand
management_practices.description: Collect, analyze and prioritize business demand and feed it into the portfolio.

management_practices.name: Measure satisfaction
management_practices.description: Regularly assess business satisfaction with I&T services and projects.

name: Manage service agreements
purpose: Define, negotiate and manage I&T service level commitments.

management_practices.name: Define the service catalog
management_practices.description: Identify and describe I&T services delivered to the business and their key characteristics.

management_practices.name: Negotiate SLAs
management_practices.description: Define and negotiate service levels (SLAs/OLAs) with the business and internal providers.

management_practices.name: Monitor service performance
management_practices.description: Measure service performance against commitments, analyze deviations and drive improvements.

name: Manage vendors
purpose: Manage the life cycle of I&T vendors and contracts to optimize value, risk and performance.

management_practices.name: Segment and select vendors
management_practices.description: Segment vendors, define selection criteria and conduct sourcing and tender processes.

management_practices.name: Manage contracts
management_practices.description: Formalize contracts including service, security and compliance commitments and manage their follow-up.

management_practices.name: Monitor vendor performance
management_practices.description: Measure key vendor performance, conduct reviews and manage improvement plans.

name: Manage quality
purpose: Ensure the quality of I&T services, projects and deliverables.

management_practices.name: Define the I&T quality framework
management_practices.description: Establish a quality policy, standards, methods and responsibilities for I&T quality.

management_practices.name: Implement quality controls
management_practices.description: Apply quality controls to projects, developments, configurations and services.

management_practices.name: Monitor and improve quality
management_practices.description: Collect quality data, analyze defects and manage continuous improvement plans.

name: Manage I&T risk
purpose: Identify, analyze, treat and monitor I&T-related risks.

management_practices.name: Identify and analyze risks
management_practices.description: Identify I&T risks, assess their causes, impacts and likelihood, and document them.

management_practices.name: Define and implement treatments
management_practices.description: Select risk responses (mitigate, transfer, accept, avoid) and implement the corresponding actions.

management_practices.name: Monitor risks
management_practices.description: Monitor the evolution of the risk profile and treatment effectiveness and report to governance bodies.

name: Manage information security
purpose: Protect information and I&T services in line with confidentiality, integrity and availability requirements.

management_practices.name: Define the security framework
management_practices.description: Establish a security policy, roles, standards and procedures consistent with risks and obligations.

management_practices.name: Implement security controls
management_practices.description: Deploy organizational and technical controls (access management, logging, data protection, etc.).

management_practices.name: Monitor and improve security
management_practices.description: Monitor security incidents, vulnerabilities and control effectiveness and manage remediation plans.

name: Manage programs and projects
purpose: Plan and execute I&T programs and projects while meeting objectives, timelines, costs and quality.

management_practices.name: Initiate and scope projects
management_practices.description: Define project objectives, scope, stakeholders, risks and business case.

management_practices.name: Control project execution
management_practices.description: Plan, track and control project progress, costs, risks and quality.

management_practices.name: Close and learn
management_practices.description: Formally close projects, measure objective achievement and capture lessons learned.

name: Manage requirements definition
purpose: Collect, analyze, validate and maintain business and I&T requirements.

management_practices.name: Collect requirements
management_practices.description: Identify stakeholder needs and formalize them as requirements.

management_practices.name: Analyze and validate
management_practices.description: Validate the coherence, feasibility and prioritization of requirements with the business.

management_practices.name: Manage traceability
management_practices.description: Ensure end-to-end traceability of requirements through design, testing and deployment.

name: Manage solutions identification and build
purpose: Design, build or acquire I&T solutions that meet the defined requirements.

management_practices.name: Design the solution
management_practices.description: Define the functional and technical architecture of the solution, including security and compliance.

management_practices.name: Build or configure
management_practices.description: Develop, parameterize or configure the solution according to quality and security standards.

management_practices.name: Test the solution
management_practices.description: Plan and execute unit, integration, performance, security and user acceptance tests and fix defects.

name: Manage availability and capacity
purpose: Ensure that I&T services achieve the required levels of availability and capacity.

management_practices.name: Plan capacity
management_practices.description: Analyze current and projected demand to define capacity and performance objectives.

management_practices.name: Manage availability
management_practices.description: Implement mechanisms required to ensure the availability of critical services.

management_practices.name: Monitor and optimize
management_practices.description: Monitor usage and performance, anticipate saturation and optimize resources.

name: Manage organizational change
purpose: Support stakeholders in adopting the changes induced by I&T solutions.

management_practices.name: Analyze business impacts
management_practices.description: Identify project impacts on processes, roles, skills and organizational culture.

management_practices.name: Plan change management
management_practices.description: Define communication, training and user support plans.

management_practices.name: Measure adoption
management_practices.description: Assess the adoption of new solutions and processes and adjust support actions if needed.

name: Manage I&T changes
purpose: Control the life cycle of changes made to services, applications and infrastructure.

management_practices.name: Record and assess changes
management_practices.description: Record change requests and analyze their risks, impacts and priorities.

management_practices.name: Authorize and plan
management_practices.description: Submit significant changes to a CAB, decide on approvals and plan deployments.

management_practices.name: Track and close
management_practices.description: Control change execution, analyze failures and update documentation and the CMDB.

name: Manage change acceptance and transitioning
purpose: Ensure that solutions are properly deployed and accepted in production.

management_practices.name: Plan go-live
management_practices.description: Prepare deliverables and deployment, communication, cutover and rollback plans.

management_practices.name: Execute the transition
management_practices.description: Execute deployment, data migration and cutover activities to the target solution.

management_practices.name: Stabilize post-production
management_practices.description: Monitor the solution after go-live, handle incidents and confirm stability.

name: Manage knowledge
purpose: Create, maintain and share knowledge required for I&T management.

management_practices.name: Identify critical knowledge
management_practices.description: Identify key knowledge and information to retain and share (procedures, solutions, templates).

management_practices.name: Manage the knowledge repository
management_practices.description: Structure, store and maintain an accessible and up-to-date knowledge base.

management_practices.name: Encourage use and enrichment
management_practices.description: Promote use of the knowledge base and regular contribution by I&T teams.

name: Manage assets
purpose: Manage the life cycle of I&T assets to optimize their value, cost and risk.

management_practices.name: Inventory assets
management_practices.description: Identify and record hardware, software, license and data assets with their key attributes.

management_practices.name: Manage the life cycle
management_practices.description: Plan acquisition, operation, maintenance and retirement of I&T assets.

management_practices.name: Monitor usage and risks
management_practices.description: Control usage, compliance (e.g., licenses) and risks associated with assets.

name: Manage configuration
purpose: Maintain reliable, up-to-date information about I&T configuration items.

management_practices.name: Define the configuration data model
management_practices.description: Define the CMDB structure, configuration item types and their relationships.

management_practices.name: Maintain the CMDB
management_practices.description: Record and update configuration items and their changes.

management_practices.name: Use configuration data
management_practices.description: Use the CMDB to analyze the impact of incidents, problems and changes.

name: Manage projects
purpose: Apply consistent project management practices across all I&T projects.

management_practices.name: Standardize project management
management_practices.description: Define a methodology, templates and roles for I&T project management.

management_practices.name: Monitor project performance
management_practices.description: Measure progress, costs, risks and quality and decide on corrective actions.

management_practices.name: Improve project practices
management_practices.description: Capture lessons learned and update project management standards.

name: Manage operations
purpose: Ensure the effective and secure day-to-day operation of I&T services.

management_practices.name: Plan and schedule operations
management_practices.description: Define recurring activities (jobs, backups, checks) and schedule them.

management_practices.name: Execute and monitor
management_practices.description: Perform operations, monitor execution and handle operational incidents.

management_practices.name: Improve operations
management_practices.description: Analyze incidents and deviations, automate and optimize operational tasks.

name: Manage service requests and incidents
purpose: Log, prioritize and efficiently resolve user service requests and incidents.

management_practices.name: Log and classify
management_practices.description: Receive tickets and log, categorize and prioritize them based on common rules.

management_practices.name: Handle and escalate
management_practices.description: Resolve tickets at the appropriate support level or escalate them according to procedures.

management_practices.name: Close and communicate
management_practices.description: Close tickets after verifying resolution and inform users.

name: Manage problems
purpose: Identify and address root causes of recurring incidents to prevent their reoccurrence.

management_practices.name: Identify and log problems
management_practices.description: Analyze recurring incidents to detect underlying problems and log them.

management_practices.name: Analyze root causes
management_practices.description: Conduct detailed analyses to identify technical and organizational root causes.

management_practices.name: Implement permanent fixes or workarounds
management_practices.description: Define and implement corrective and preventive actions and update the knowledge base.

name: Manage continuity
purpose: Ensure continuity and recovery of I&T services in the event of a major incident.

management_practices.name: Define continuity requirements
management_practices.description: Identify critical services and define RTO/RPO and disaster scenarios with the business.

management_practices.name: Implement continuity arrangements
management_practices.description: Design and deploy technical and organizational solutions for continuity and recovery.

management_practices.name: Test and maintain plans
management_practices.description: Regularly test continuity and disaster recovery plans and update them after changes or incidents.

name: Manage security services
purpose: Protect I&T services against security threats and manage security incidents.

management_practices.name: Monitor security
management_practices.description: Set up collection and analysis of security logs and alerts.

management_practices.name: Manage security incidents
management_practices.description: Detect, analyze, contain and handle security incidents and communicate appropriately.

management_practices.name: Strengthen security posture
management_practices.description: Analyze trends, remediate vulnerabilities and improve security controls.

name: Manage business process controls
purpose: Ensure the effectiveness of automated and manual controls in business processes supported by I&T.

management_practices.name: Identify key controls
management_practices.description: Identify key controls in business processes supported by information systems.

management_practices.name: Implement and document controls
management_practices.description: Design, configure and document automated and manual controls.

management_practices.name: Test and improve controls
management_practices.description: Periodically test control effectiveness and implement improvements when needed.

name: Monitor, evaluate and assess performance and conformance
purpose: Ensure regular monitoring of I&T performance and conformance with internal policies and obligations.

management_practices.name: Define indicators and reports
management_practices.description: Establish an I&T dashboard aligned with business and governance objectives.

management_practices.name: Collect and analyze results
management_practices.description: Measure performance and conformance and analyze trends and significant deviations.

management_practices.name: Report and trigger actions
management_practices.description: Publish reports to stakeholders and drive action plans when deviations occur.

name: Monitor, evaluate and assess the system of internal control
purpose: Regularly evaluate the design and effectiveness of the I&T internal control system.

management_practices.name: Define the internal control framework
management_practices.description: Document principles, responsibilities and reference frameworks for I&T internal control.

management_practices.name: Evaluate controls
management_practices.description: Perform control reviews and tests to assess their design and operating effectiveness.

management_practices.name: Track remediation plans
management_practices.description: Record control weaknesses, define corrective actions and track their implementation.

name: Monitor, evaluate and assess compliance with external requirements
purpose: Ensure compliance with external requirements applicable to I&T (regulatory, contractual, standards).

management_practices.name: Identify external requirements
management_practices.description: Identify laws, regulations, standards and contractual clauses applicable to I&T.

management_practices.name: Assess compliance
management_practices.description: Perform compliance reviews or audits to detect non-compliance.

management_practices.name: Address non-compliance
management_practices.description: Implement corrective and preventive actions and track progress until resolution.
